com.golden.gamedev.engine.input
Class KeyTyped

java.lang.Object
  com.golden.gamedev.engine.input.KeyTyped

public class KeyTyped
extends java.lang.Object

KeyTyped class is a class to simulate key typing. Key typed is a key that pressed for some time and the key event is fired following initial repeat delay and repeat rate delay.

See Also:
update(long), getKeyTyped()

Constructor Summary
KeyTyped(BaseInput bsInput)
          Constructs new KeyTyped with 450 ms repeat delay and 40 ms repeat rate.
KeyTyped(BaseInput bsInput, int repeatDelay, int repeatRate)
          Constructs new KeyTyped using following input engine, and specified initial repeat delay and repeat rate delay.

 int getKeyTyped()
          Returns key typed or BaseInput.NO_KEY if no key is being typed.
